Contributor: Bouisset, Firmin, artist.; Imprimerie de Vaugirard, printer.;
Note: Signed "Firmin Bouisset." Date based on dates of 1st World War. "Visa No. 13426" appears on the bottom right of the poster. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text in French says to subscribe to a Loan for the liberation from the London County & Westminster Bank in Paris. Illustration shows three military men from different countries. One man is in a kilt.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.

Title: Emprunt de la liberation
